name: Jeep Adventure Hills Free
description:
eep Adventure Hills is a wonderful game for everyone who need fast speed mountain racing games. Now it isn't just about drag race or drift racing - now you have to climb to the hill. Face the challenges of unique hill climbing environments with many different sport cars jeep cars, Truck like Jeeps. Do you ever control your car to climb hills with most realistic racing cars control before? Drift your car and be the next racing revolution.
All you have to do is to climb uphill to the meeting of platforms.
Show your extreme racing skills over mountainous road in this exciting and challenging game.
This is normal difficulty level racing game for the real racing lovers.
Enjoy the fun of controlling a racing car over hilly view!
Race on a high detailed track! This game is for all extreme sport enthusiasts including jeeps,
4 wheelers!
***** Highlighted Features *****
• Amazing 3D graphics
• Physics-based racing game
• Both technical and very fast track
• Highly 4WD SUV
• Real car's physics
• Real turbo sound!
• Intuitive steering (with accelerometer)
• Designed for a good display on devices with low and high resolutions (including tablets)
• Just use accelerometer to turn, touch right side of the screen to accelerate, left to break reverse.
• EASY TO LEARN - hard to master!
• Fresh and beautiful style, bright and vibrant graphics & photo!
• There is a time limit, but each stage has target points to proceed to next stage.
